thread.title: Senate leaders reach $300 billion budget deal

title: Senate leaders reach $300 billion budget deal
text:
Senate leaders reach $300 billion budget deal 12:52am IST - 01:28 
The U.S. Senate on Wednesday reached a two-year bipartisan budget deal worth around $300 billion that would lift caps on defense and domestic government spending in an attempt to end the kind of squabbling over fiscal issues that has plagued Washington for years. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
